nbt.description: The NBT data to check for.
nbt.markdownDescription: The NBT data to check for.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: NBT (Block Condition Type) date: 2021-10-02

NBT

Block Condition Type

Checks the NBT of the block entity.

Type ID: origins:nbt

Fields

Field Type Default Description
nbt NBT The NBT data to check for.

Examples

"block_condition": {
    "type": "origins:and",
    "conditions": [
        {
            "type": "origins:block",
            "block": "minecraft:beacon"
        },
        {
            "type": "origins:nbt",
            "nbt": "{Levels: 1}"
        }
    ]
}

This example will check if Beacon block has a Level value of 1.
